snippet.title: Roman Sands RE:Build - Official Xbox Announcement Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Get a fresh look at Roman Sands RE:Build, meet the characters, and take a look at gameplay in this latest trailer for the upcoming horror, visual novel game from developer Arbitrary Metric and publisher Serenity Forge. Roman Sands RE:Build will be available on PC in summer 2023 and on consoles in winter 2023.
